attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not to use taxpayers money (£100 million)to bail out an elitist company like Jaguar/Landover that only produces LUXURY cars. The MAJORITY of people in this country drive very average non luxury cars. As the original dragon from Dragons Den, Simon Woodroffe said today on sky news, "HE WOULD NOT WANT TO INVEST £100 MILLION INTO A COMPANY THAT DOES NOT SHOW ITS ECO-FRIENDLY CREDENTIALS. I agree it seems outragous to even think of it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
